page.title: 03INDUSTRY IRON ENGINEERING
page.content: Until 1802 Shotts was a collection of spaced out farms.That year iron and coal were found in quantity on the moors.From then on the town grew. {Shotts Ironworks}became famous for fine iron castings and tinned hollow ware.Gas lamp standards were a typical product.Production of iron continued till about 1960,and foundry work carried on for a few more years.The closure of the ironworks had a bad effect on employment. At about this time a factory was set up by the American Cummins company for the manufacture of diesel engines, which continues to provide employment. The site of the ironworks has now partly been landscaped and an era has gone.
